footer.tagline: Your trusted partner in industrial bearings
footer.newsletterText: Stay updated with our latest products and industry news.

home.heroSubtitle: Precision and reliability for various applications
home.aboutTitle: Your Trusted Partner in Industrial Bearings
home.aboutText1: Quaval is a Canadian company at the forefront of the bearing industry, specializing in the import, export, and distribution of premium rolling bearings.
home.aboutText2: Our mission is to provide original bearings that optimize our clients' operations, leading to increased production and improved quality.
home.feature1Desc: We offer high-quality original bearings from trusted brands like Kinex, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.
home.feature2Desc: Our products are designed to save money, time, and effort, leading to increased production and improved bottom line.
home.feature3Desc: We treat each customer fairly and honestly, adhering to anti-discrimination laws and maintaining the highest ethical standards.
home.featuresSubtitle: We deliver quality and reliability at every turn
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Elevate Your Machinery Performance?
home.ctaText: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who trust Quaval Bearings for their industrial needs.
home.ctaFeature1Desc: Quick delivery to minimize your downtime
home.ctaFeature3Desc: Technical assistance when you need it

products.noProductsAvailable: No products available for your region. Please select a different region.
products.productDoesNotExist: The product you are looking for does not exist.
products.customizeOrderDescription: You have the flexibility to customize your order with our team. Whether you need specific modifications or want to arrange installment payments, we're here to help. You'll receive a reply within 2 working days through your registered email.
products.customizeOrderSubmitted: Your request has been submitted. We'll contact you within 2 working days.

cart.secureCheckoutNotice: Your transaction is secure. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your information.
cart.itemRemovedDescription: The item has been removed from your cart
cart.itemSavedDescription: Item has been saved for later
cart.itemMovedToCartDescription: Item has been added to your cart

checkout.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
checkout.cancellationMessage: Your payment was cancelled and no charges were made.
checkout.cartItemsSaved: Your cart items are still saved. You can try again or continue shopping.
checkout.orderReceived: Your order has been received and is being processed.
checkout.emailConfirmation: You will receive an email confirmation with your order details.
checkout.emailConfirmationSent: Email confirmation has been sent to your inbox.
checkout.processingDescription: Our team will process your order and prepare it for shipping.
checkout.trackingInformation: Once your order ships, you'll receive tracking information via email.
